scripts.clean:core: graph clean --codegen-dir core/generated/ --build-dir core/build/ && rm core/subgraph.yaml.bak.*
scripts.deploy:core:arbitrum-sepolia-devnet: graph deploy --product subgraph-studio kleros-v2-core-devnet -l v$npm_package_version core/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:core:arbitrum-sepolia: graph deploy --product subgraph-studio kleros-v2-core-testnet -l v$npm_package_version core/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:core:arbitrum: graph deploy --product subgraph-studio kleros-v2-core-mainnet -l v$npm_package_version core/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:core:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 kleros/kleros-v2-core-local --version-label v$(date +%s) core/subgraph.yaml
scripts.rebuild-deploy:core:local: yarn update:core:local && yarn codegen:core && yarn build:core && yarn create:local kleros/kleros-v2-core-local && yarn deploy:core:local
scripts.deploy:drt:arbitrum-sepolia-devnet: graph deploy --product subgraph-studio kleros-v2-drt-arbisep-devnet -l v$npm_package_version dispute-template-registry/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:drt:arbitrum-sepolia: graph deploy --product subgraph-studio kleros-v2-drt-arbisep-testnet -l v$npm_package_version dispute-template-registry/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:drt:arbitrum: graph deploy --product subgraph-studio kleros-v2-drt-arbisep-mainnet -l v$npm_package_version dispute-template-registry/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:drt:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 kleros/kleros-v2-drt-local --version-label v$(date +%s) dispute-template-registry/subgraph.yaml
scripts.rebuild-deploy:drt:local: yarn update:drt:local && yarn codegen:drt && yarn build:drt && yarn create:local kleros/kleros-v2-drt-local && yarn deploy:drt:local
scripts.start-local-indexer: docker compose -f ../services/graph-node/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f ../services/graph-node/docker-compose.yml logs -f
